016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.server;
017
018
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthCheckRegistry;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthCheckResult;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthStatus;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
025import jakarta.inject.Inject;
026import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
028import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Connector;
029import org.eclipse.jetty.server.NetworkConnector;
030import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server;
031import org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle;
032import org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread.ThreadPool;
033import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Immediate;
034import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PostConstruct;
035import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
036import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
037import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
038
039@Service(name = "jetty.server")
040@RunLevel(18)
041public class JettyLifecycleService
042        implements PreDestroy {
043
044    private final Logger logger;
045    private final Server server;
046
047    @Inject
048    public JettyLifecycleService(Server server, HealthCheckRegistry healthCheckRegistry, Logger logger) throws Exception {
049        this.server = server;
050        this.logger = logger;
051        healthCheckRegistry.register("jetty.server", this::check);
052        server.start();
053        logger.info("Started Jetty server");
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void preDestroy() {
058        logger.info("Stopping Jetty server");
059        try {
060            server.stop();
061        } catch (Throwable e) {
062            logger.error(e);
063        }
064    }
065
066    HealthCheckResult check() {
067        ObjectNode info = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
068        String lifeCycleState = toLifeCycleState(server);
069        info.put("lifecycle", lifeCycleState);
070        ArrayNode connectors = info.putArray("connectors");
071        for (Connector connector : server.getConnectors()) {
072            ObjectNode connectorInfo = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
073            if (connector instanceof NetworkConnector networkConnector) {
074                connectorInfo.put("host", networkConnector.getHost());
075                connectorInfo.put("port", networkConnector.getPort());
076                connectorInfo.put("localPort", networkConnector.getLocalPort());
077            }
078            connectorInfo.put("name", connector.getName());
079            connectorInfo.put("protocols", String.join(", ", connector.getProtocols()));
080            connectorInfo.put("idleTimeout", connector.getIdleTimeout());
081            connectorInfo.put("lifecycle", toLifeCycleState(connector));
082            connectors.add(connectorInfo);
083        }
084        ObjectNode threadpoolNode = info.putObject("threadpool");
085        ThreadPool threadPool = server.getThreadPool();
086        threadpoolNode.put("threads", threadPool.getThreads());
087        threadpoolNode.put("idleThreads", threadPool.getIdleThreads());
088        HealthStatus healthStatus = toHealthStatus(server);
089        return new HealthCheckResult(healthStatus, healthStatus.healthy() ? null : lifeCycleState, null, info);
090    }
091
092    private static String toLifeCycleState(LifeCycle lifeCycle) {
093        if (lifeCycle.isRunning()) {
094            return "running";
095        }
096        if (lifeCycle.isStarted()) {
097            return "started";
098        }
099        if (lifeCycle.isFailed()) {
100            return "failed";
101        }
102        if (lifeCycle.isStopped()) {
103            return "stopped";
104        }
105        if (lifeCycle.isStarting()) {
106            return "starting";
107        }
108        if (lifeCycle.isStopping()) {
109            return "stopping";
110        }
111        return "unknown";
112    }
113
114    private static HealthStatus toHealthStatus(LifeCycle lifeCycle) {
115        if (lifeCycle.isRunning()) {
116            return HealthStatus.HEALTHY;
117        }
118        if (lifeCycle.isStarting() || lifeCycle.isStarted()) {
119            return HealthStatus.INITIALIZING;
120        }
121        return HealthStatus.UNHEALTHY;
122    }
123}
